archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Reconciliation
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
Send a list to FSP, to pay $X to this list of Y beneficiaries. FSP pays them, sends a list back with duplicates, exception list or payments that did not go through.
It can be automated or manual if bank doesn't have capacity or if low-tech deep field.
This would potentially happen in HCR. Will get read only view of it as a payment record.
If its not a HCR FSP how we do it is tbd, but this has to reach back to CashAssist potentially since the actual reconciliation has to happen in CA.
